notes: [Fixed] Fixed a critical error where includes would fail since Craft 2.6.2951 deprecated AND changed the return value of craft()->getBuild().
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where numbers were being formatted incorrectly for fields with number column type.
[Added] Add setting to allow visible preparse field contents to be highlighted by the user, toggles input from disabled to readonly. (swixpop)
[Added] Added config setting for resaving element and parsing fields on structures.onMoveElement. Useful if you use .parent() or similar structure-specific code in your preparsed twig.
[Improved] Added support for decimals when column type is number.
[Improved] Field values are now trimmed if the column type is number (marionnewlevant)
[Fixed] Fixed issue that resulted in a fatal error in PHP 5.3
[Added] Added a field setting to parse the field before element save. This makes sure the search index is updated correctly with the field value. (carlcs)

[Added] The plugin now supports saving elements with Preparse fields from a console command. It keeps track of which fields got already parsed in memory instead of session variables, and thus doesn’t rely on cookies. (carlcs)
[Improved] Twig errors that might occur when rendering a field’s Twig code now don’t block the elememt from being saved and the error messages are now logged in the preparsefield.log file. (carlcs)
[Improved] Removed the settings to disable table columns as the plugin requires Craft 2.5+ anyways. (carlcs)
[Improved] The plugin now makes sure requirements are met before installation. (carlcs)
[Fixed] Fixed issue with the “Twig Code” field title not displaying in the field settings. (carlcs)
[Added] Database column type can now be set pr field. (marionnewlevant)
[Fixed] Fix for deprecated methods PathsService::getTemplatesPath() and setTemplatesPath() in Craft 2.6.2778 and newer.

[Fixed] Fixed issue where the preparse field would generate an endless loop if the twig code produced a new result every time it was run. Flash variables are now used instead of comparing parse result.
[Added] I can haz (ugly) icon.
[Fixed] Fixed an issue where field is always visible inside Matrix blocks. (mmikkel)
[Fixed] Added support for displaying on element index pages. (carlcs)
[Fixed] Set generateTransformsBeforePageLoad = true before running twig. (brandonkelly)
[Fixed] Added support for displaying commerce element types on element index pages. (marionnewlevant)
[Fixed] Adds global config setting to disable in element index columns. (mildlygeeky)
[Added] Initial release.
